icon-color.description: icon color, font icon is valid
icon-color.description_zh: icon的颜色，字体图标时有效

icon-size.description: The size of the icon, unitized in rpx, if src is the image path, this parameter can set the size of the image
icon-size.description_zh: icon的大小，单位rpx，如果src为图片路径，此参数可以设置图片的尺寸

src.description: If the icon name or image path (absolute path) is defined, the mode parameter will be invalidated
src.description_zh: 图标名称或者图片路径(绝对路径)，如定义，mode参数会失效

font-size.description: The size of the prompt text, in rpx

mode.description_zh: 内置的图标，见上方说明

img-width.description: The width of the icon, in rpx

img-height.description: The height of the icon, in rpx

show.description: Whether or not to display the portlet

margin-top.description: The spacing from the component to the previous element, in rpx
margin-top.description_zh: 组件到上一个元素的间距,单位rpx

slots.name: bottom
slots.description: Pass the slot content to the bottom of the component
